## Proposal summary

Describe the governance pack and the problem it addresses.

## Scope

- [ ] New governance documents
- [ ] Updates to existing governance documents
- [ ] Clarification of contributor/review process
- [ ] Release or compatibility process documentation

## Draft contents

List the proposed documents and what each one covers.

## Relationship to existing docs

Identify related files and how this proposal complements them.

## Review considerations

List questions or decisions reviewers should focus on.
